songs.title: Kash Doll Speaks (Part One)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Trapped in the dollhouse
Joy roll, Dexter F is the block we on
I woke up like this!
Can somebody tell me it's a badder bitch out
Nah, can somebody tell me?
Yeah

[Verse 1]
See I walk like a boss nigga look at the strut
Small waist, thick as hell, nigga look at the butt
Got them D's up top, nigga look at the cup
And my diamonds so clear nigga look at the cut!

[Outro]
Damn, I'm recording?
Aye BJ bring that back
I don't think they heard what the fuck I just said
